response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $13,000 for this exceptional item. This price not only ensures a fair return for us but also represents a significant saving for you compared to its market value of $15,000. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your operations with this outstanding product.", "product_price": 13000}
